main event: An observer sighted a bright blue-green round object in the sky over Albuquerque, New Mexico on April 20, 1949.
interesting points: The object was very bright and lasted in view for only two seconds before it disappeared., The observer described the apparent size of the object as about 1/10th the size of the moon., The object was reported to have flown heading West., There were no sounds or trails observed during the sighting., The conditions were clear at the time of the observation.
witness description: a farmer who observed the light in the sky
